scripts.dev: concurrently --config .concurrently.json -n "shared,backend,frontend" -c "blue,green,cyan" "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:be" "npm run dev:fe"
scripts.dev:fe-only: npm run build:shared && npm run dev:fe
scripts.dev:be-only: npm run build:shared && npm run dev:be
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build -ws --if-present
scripts.health: curl -f http://localhost:3000/health || echo 'Backend not ready' && curl -f http://localhost:5173 || echo 'Frontend not ready'
scripts.ports: lsof -i :3000,:5173 | grep LISTEN || echo 'No services running on default ports'
scripts.release:full: npm run version release && npm run release:build && npm run release:deploy
